reviews.review: Интересная и местами веселая игра
good game for good brothers <3

I'm still learning some of the games strategies, but I really have enjoyed it.
The replayabley of the game is impressive. Random map generations, multiple killers, multiple perk paths for the killer to have focused on, and then there's the Survivors. There's SO many and all with their own perks!

Catching up to the standard player lvl is a little steep tho. Getting the Bloodpoints to buy the perks is nearly impossible as a starter Killer, you pretty much have to play survivor unless you want to watch the "searching for match" screen for 5+ minutes as a newbie Killer.

Довольно долгое время не играл в игру, но тут введи "архивы" мне стало очень интересно. Вернулся в игру, и что я вижу?? За маньяков игры ищутся по пол часа, а если найдётся то не факт что поиграешь, вылетает с лобби с ошибкой, соло сурвом тоже долго игры ищутся, и это при хорошем онлайне,баги, лаги и куча,куча всего плохого,. Не рекомендую к покупке на данный момент, впечатление что разрабы положили на игру огромный болт и продают скинчики пока покупают. Иного объяснения этому техническому трешу я найти не могу. Обидно игра то всё равно интересная а ещё и архивы.
It's very special

Dead by buglight is a good game, but there is too much glitches... Problem appear in almost every game mechanic... Hitboxes, loadings, items and a lot more. It's really fun to play, but killer hitboxes are like bullpoo. Maybe in the future, devs will fix those problems, at least I hope so. When hitboxes will be fixed, I will change my review to positive.

This game quickly became one of my favorite games of all time. At first it is scary, like too scary, the jump scares were something I wasn't sure I would get used to. Once you get used to it, and to be honest you never completely grow out of that, you get into the meat of the game. This game is hide and seek on steroids, if you get caught you get murdered, and I have to say it's crazy fun. Even if you hide your face during scary movies I would recommend giving this a try, this game will give you exciting new experiences unlike any game I have personally ever played.

А до обновы было 45-60.Компы с видеокартой gtx560 с intelcore i5  не могут вытянуть эту игру. В итоге я поиграл в неё всего год и отдал за это 500рублей.

Ein gutes Spiel, was fast süchtig macht. Die Entwickler lassen sich immer wieder was Neues einfallen und manchmal bekommt man richtiges Herzklopfen, wenn man einen beinahe unsichtbaren Killer wie Ghostface oder Michael Myers als Gegenüber hat.
Immer wieder lassen sich aber auch Bugs finden, aber seltsamerweise bin ich der Meinung...ohne Bugs wär das Spiel "langweilig", denn die gehören zum Spiel dazu =) und das meine ich durchaus positiv...klar, manchmal nervt das, aber wenn alles glatt laufen würde, worüber soll man sich dann aufregen =D und die Entwickler tun alles, damit das Spiel flüssiger läuft. Daumen hoch für Dead by Daylight.

the developers took too long to figure out what the game should be, while the old players had moved to other games already. this is what happens when game developers don't care about player's opinions. Still alot to improve tho

I've reviewed the game back in 2019 as a fun game, dont get me wrong, still is.

But i feel like there're a few things i need to point out (do note this is reviewed at version 5.6.2 of the game)

- Matchmaking is weird af, i can get matched with really good survivors and it's a little hard for me to get used to the game again after stopped playing the game for a whole year, wish they'd fix it anytime soon, which i heard they are actually, good.

- The Community is just toxic, too toxic. I don't rlly give a fuck about them myself, but i feel bad for those who just wanted to have fun, only to get their mood absolutely destroyed by Toxic a-holes. I feel like the Devs can maybe add a player manner system in the game.

In overall, the game is still very enjoyable, just kinda not new player friendly / coming back players friendly as well.

8.7/10

Conclusion : Can be a fun games and worth trying if you're bored.
